creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: tiny figure holding a net at L in front of rows of waves; very high horizon line
marks:
Signature, Stamp

in graphite on verso: a64545 | signed in graphite, lower right: [DY Cameron]
sig
provenance: E.M. Henn; Kennedy Galleries; [C. & J. Goodfriend, New York, until February 13, 1986; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Waves
